name: react-electron
description: Boilerplate for development in ElectronJS with ReactJS

scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode production --config webpack.build.config.js && electron --noDevServer .
scripts.install-latest: npm i @babel/preset-env@latest && npm i @babel/preset-react@latest && npm i babel-loader@latest  && npm i babili-webpack-plugin@latest && npm i cross-env@latest  && npm i electron@latest && npm i electron-devtools-installer@latest && npm i electron-packager@latest && npm i file-loader@latest  && npm i html-webpack-plugin@latest  && npm i html-webpack-plugin@latest && npm i style-loader@latest
